caption:
A fabric-covered armchair with a patterned beige and brown upholstery. The chair has a cushioned seat and backrest, with visible wear on the fabric. Likely used for seating in a living space. Positioned against a wall near a cluttered shelf filled with various items like boxes and bags.

"A fabric-covered armchair with beige and brown patterns. Cushioned seat and backrest show signs of use. Likely serves as seating furniture. Located against a wall near a storage shelf."
